Installation of the GaussForHomalg-Package GaussForHomalg
To install this package just extract the package's archive file to the GAP pkg directory.
By default the GaussForHomalg package is not automatically loaded by &GAP; when it is installed. You must load the package with LoadPackage("GaussForHomalg"); before its functions become available.
